resources.string: Forum mavzusi unda odamlar izoh qoldirish uchun yaratiladi
Agar belgilangan bo‘lsa, xabar sizni blogingizda namoyish etiladi. Agar yo‘q bo‘lsa, u yopiq bo‘lib, sizning qoralama xabarlaringiz ichida bo‘ladi
Ushbu blog postini butunlay o\'chirib tashlash

string.name: safeToUseImages
string.comment:
safeToUseImages
This is mentioned because the images there are royalty-free, so there is no risk of copyright infringement.

resources.string: Blog postingizda muhokama qiladigan mavzularni tanlang

Siz shuningdek o‘zgalarning mualliflik huquqi bilan ximoyalanmagan barcha narsalardan tashqari yana o‘zingizning shaxsiy rasmlaringizni, sur‘atlaringizni va Lichess skrinshotlarini ishlatishingiz mumkin.
Iltimos faqat xavfsiz va \"hurmat\"li ma‘qolalarni nashr eting. Boshqalarning ma‘lumotlarini nusxalamang.
Mumkin bo‘lmagan ma‘lumotlar joylanishi sizning hisobingizni yopilishiga sabab bo‘lishi mumkin.

string.name: blogTips
string.comment:
blogTips
This is a link to https://lichess.org/page/blog-tips. Appears when creating a new post.

resources.string: Blogda yaxshi postlar yozish uchun bizning oddiy maslahatlarimiz
